name: Virtua Target
description:
Simple target range with score attack mode. Use a shotgun, pistol, smg or grenade launcher to mow down targets and rack up points.

Controls:

Aim with Mouse.
Fire with Left Mouse Button
Charge grenade distance by holding down Left Mouse Button, then releasing.
Reload with Right Mouse Button

Target Info
